verses.verse: Now <WH6258> gather <WH1413> yourself in troops, <WH1413> O daughter <WH1323> of troops: <WH1416> he has laid <WH7760> siege <WH4692> against <WH5921> us: they shall smite <WH5221> the judge <WH8199> of Israel <WH3478> with a rod <WH7626> on the cheek. <WH3895>

But you, Bethlehem <WH1035> Ephratah, <WH672> though you be little <WH6810> among the thousands <WH505> of Judah, <WH3063> yet out of you shall he come <WH3318> forth <WH3318> to me that is to be ruler <WH4910> in Israel; <WH3478> whose goings <WH4163> forth <WH4163> have been from of old, <WH6924> from everlasting. <WH5769>

Therefore <WH3651> will he give <WH5414> them up, until <WH5704> the time <WH6256> that she which travails <WH3205> has brought <WH3205> forth: <WH3205> then the remnant <WH3499> of his brothers <WH251> shall return <WH7725> to the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And he shall stand <WH5975> and feed <WH7462> in the strength <WH5797> of the LORD, <WH3068> in the majesty <WH1347> of the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068> his God; <WH430> and they shall abide: <WH3427> for now <WH6258> shall he be great <WH1431> to the ends <WH657> of the earth. <WH776>

And this <WH2088> man shall be the peace, <WH7965> when <WH3588> the Assyrian <WH804> shall come <WH935> into our land: <WH776> and when <WH3588> he shall tread <WH1869> in our palaces, <WH759> then shall we raise <WH6965> against <WH5921> him seven <WH7651> shepherds, <WH7462> and eight <WH8083> principal <WH5257> men. <WH120>

And they shall waste <WH7489> the land <WH776> of Assyria <WH804> with the sword, <WH2719> and the land <WH776> of Nimrod <WH5248> in the entrances <WH6607> thereof: thus shall he deliver <WH5337> us from the Assyrian, <WH804> when <WH3588> he comes <WH935> into our land, <WH776> and when <WH3588> he treads <WH1869> within our borders. <WH1366>

And the remnant <WH7611> of Jacob <WH3290> shall be in the middle <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a dew <WH2919> from the LORD, <WH3068> as the showers <WH7241> on the grass, <WH6212> that tarries <WH6960> not for man, <WH376> nor <WH3808> waits <WH3176> for the sons <WH1121> of men. <WH120>

And the remnant <WH7611> of Jacob <WH3290> shall be among the Gentiles <WH1471> in the middle <WH7130> of many <WH7227> people <WH5971> as a lion <WH738> among the beasts <WH929> of the forest, <WH3293> as a young <WH3715> lion <WH3715> among the flocks <WH5739> of sheep: <WH6629> who, <WH834> if <WH518> he go <WH5674> through, <WH5674> both treads <WH7429> down, and tears <WH2963> in pieces, and none <WH369> can deliver. <WH5337>
Your hand <WH3027> shall be lifted <WH7311> up on your adversaries, <WH6862> and all your enemies <WH341> shall be cut <WH3772> off.

And it shall come <WH1961> to pass in that day, <WH3117> said <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> that I will cut <WH3772> off your horses <WH5483> out of the middle <WH7130> of you, and I will destroy <WH6> your chariots: <WH4818>
And I will cut <WH3772> off the cities <WH5892> of your land, <WH776> and throw <WH2040> down <WH2040> all <WH3605> your strong <WH4013> holds: <WH4013>
And I will cut <WH3772> off witchcrafts <WH3785> out of your hand; <WH3027> and you shall have <WH1961> no <WH3808> more soothsayers: <WH6049>

Your graven <WH6456> images <WH4676> also will I cut <WH3772> off, and your standing <WH4676> images out of the middle <WH7130> of you; and you shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> worship <WH7812> the work <WH4639> of your hands. <WH3027>
And I will pluck <WH5428> up your groves <WH842> out of the middle <WH7130> of you: so will I destroy <WH8045> your cities. <WH5892>
And I will execute <WH6213> vengeance <WH5359> in anger <WH639> and fury <WH2534> on the heathen, <WH1471> such as they have not heard. <WH8085>
